amendment.description: Relating to the American Forces Network.

action.text: Proposed amendment SA 1425 withdrawn in Senate.
Measure laid before Senate by unanimous consent.
Amendment SA 1425 proposed by Senator Levin for Senator Harkin. (consideration: CR S8821-8822; text: CR S8822) Relating to the American Forces Network.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1425 proposed by Senator Levin for Senator Harkin.
